Name: Hamed Baghal Ghaffari
AboutMe: I have graduated in Msc Pure Mathematics from the IASBS University of Basic Science in Zanjan, Iran in September 2013 and have planned to continue my study in a PhD program. Actually I love all fields of Mathematics and I am trying to see all kinds of questions. For now my major field is Fourier Analysis. I also mostly check mathematical Analysis, Harmonic Analysis and some other minor field such as Quantum Information Theory. I am so eager to see any idea in mathematical analysis. My formal email is baghalghaffari@gmail.com . I love having contacts with any mathematical persons.
